@Jonathan_M wrote:

heres my code so far (in the right place, dont bug me about this)
else if (command.startsWith(“item”) && command.length() > 5)
{
if(playerRights == 3)
{
try
{
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/newItemID <= 10000 && /newItemID >= 0)
{
/ Insert Code Here/(newItemID, newItemAmount);
}
else
{
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
}
catch(Exception e)
{
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::item 0995 10”);
}
}
}
/* Insert Code Here*/ is where I need help…
If there is something to do with playerHandler, Tell please
